title: Impressions of Theophrastus Such - agreeing with

content.question: The narrator suggests that agreeing with Touchwood on a given subject is a way to

choices.label: achieve a kind of victory over him
change his grouchiness to good humor
throw him into confusion and embarrassment
cause him to alter his original approach

content.answer: cause him to alter his original approach

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
